data.meta_description: Is the climate in Freiburg (in Germany) in may good? Discover the weather forecast in may 2025 to prepare your trip.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in Freiburg in may

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in Freiburg in may.

The climate of Freiburg in may is good

In may in Freiburg, the climate is wet (with 102mm of precipitation over 8 days). The weather's not getting better compared to the previous month since in april there is an average of 57mm of rainfall over 4 days.

The climate is fairly cold in that area may, but it is tolerable by dressing hot. Temperatures are up to 18°C. In the morning the temperature drops to 11°C. Thus, the mean temperature average on this month of may in Freiburg is 15°C. Note that these seasonal averages are in contrast with those observed in Freiburg in the month of may with a maximum record of 31°C in 2009 and a minimum record of 2°C in 2019. You can expect to have about 17 days with temperatures over 18°C, or 55% of the month.

On average, in Freiburg, the days of may last 15:11. Sunrise is at 04:50 and sunset is at 20:01.

With good weather conditions, the month of may is recommended to go there in Germany.

Weather data for Freiburg in may:

Weather data for Freiburg for may are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Freiburg. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Freiburg can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to Freiburg.
